Hi guys! I'd like to show you the method to activate the RTM build 
So, 
1. Open command promt as admin
2. If you are using Pro, type these lines ONE BY ONE! 
-ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato 
If you are on Enterprise
slmgr.vbs -ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4

@botakal: The Enterprise version has more features than Pro. You can check out the differences here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_8_editions

@mudslag: Read the torrent description above for the installation keys.

@pakundo, @venomv1986, @sat715: You can activate Windows 8 using the guide below.

While in Desktop Mode, right click the bottom left corner. Click "Command Prompt (Admin)". Enter these commands line-by-line:

For Win 8 Enterprise:
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato

For Win 8 Professional:
slmgr.vbs -ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
slmgr /skms kms-c.no-ip.org:1688
slmgr.vbs -ato

Guys, I've just activated it today. Here are the steps:

1. Synchronize your pc time trough internet (in settings of Time/Date is a button for it)
2. Reboot
3. Make a text file on desktop
4. Put this code inside:

"@echo off 
cls
REG QUERY "HKUS-1-5-19" >NUL 2>&1 && (
GOTO mainmenu
) || (
echo Right click and run as administrator...
echo.
pause
GOTO exit
)

:mainmenu 
title Windows 8 Activator
echo.
echo. Windows 8 KMS Activator by Utkarsh
echo. Select Windows 8 Version
echo. A. Windows 8 Enterprise
echo. B. Windows 8 Enterprise N
echo. C. Windows 8 Professional
echo.

:CHOOSEACTION
set /p userinp=    ^   Make your selection: 
set userinp=%userinp:~0,1%
if /i "%userinp%"=="A" goto W8EK
if /i "%userinp%"=="B" goto W8ENK
if /i "%userinp%"=="C" goto W8PK
echo.Try Again...
GOTO CHOOSEACTION

:cleanup
cscript "C:WindowsSystem32slmgr.vbs" /ckms

:W8EK
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -upk
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -ipk 32JNW-9KQ84-P47T8-D8GGY-CWCK7
goto W8

:W8ENK
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -upk
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -ipk JMNMF-RHW7P-DMY6X-RF3DR-X2BQT
goto W8

:W8PK
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -upk
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" -ipk NG4HW-VH26C-733KW-K6F98-J8CK4
goto W8

:W8
cls
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" /skms benderrodriguez-1-pt.tunnel.tserv28.waw1.ipv6.he.net
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" /ato
GOTO Done

:Done
cls
echo. Congrats
echo. Confirm that Windows is activated
pause
goto Confirm

:Confirm
cls
echo. Choose - 
echo. A. Activated
echo. B. Not Activated
echo.

:CHOOSEACTION
set /p userinp=    ^   Make your selection: 
set userinp=%userinp:~0,1%
if /i "%userinp%"=="A" goto Congrats
if /i "%userinp%"=="B" goto W8X
echo.Try Again...
GOTO CHOOSEACTION

:Congrats
pause

:W8X
cls
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" /skms 216.218.186.2
cscript "c:windowssystem32slmgr.vbs" /ato
GOTO DoneX

:DoneX
cls
echo. Congrats
echo. Confirm that Windows is activated
pause
goto Confirm

:Confirm
cls
echo. Choose - 
echo. A. Activated
echo. B. Not Activated
echo.

:CHOOSEACTIONX
set /p userinp=    ^   Make your selection: 
set userinp=%userinp:~0,1%
if /i "%userinp%"=="A" goto Congrats
if /i "%userinp%"=="B" goto W8
echo.Try Again...
GOTO CHOOSEACTIONX
"
Save with ".bat" extension. Then run it, mine win activated after third attempt. Good luck :)

I successfully activated my W8 Enterprise by using the ff method:

Volume MAK Key for Enterprise VL
 PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C 

 How to activate your Windows 8 Pro/Enterprise:

 1. Run cmd as admin. Enter slmgr /ipk PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C (Only for Enterprise and Pro)
 2. Turn off your internet connection
 3. Open activation window and click "Activate". It'll show your an error.
 4. After that you'll see "Activate by phone" button.
 5.  i used united kingdom for the country, Call microsoft and enter code from message, which you will see.
 6. you should choose for business, If they ask about number of computer, where you will use this key, say 1

this should work and your w8 should be activated for good. goodluck!
